structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Application Approval; Requirements By Incubator Sponsor

text.section: the business applying for financial aid has a clearly developed business concept or prototype;
the business has a reasonable chance of being commercially successful;

the financial aid provided by the Agency shall be used to further commercialization of the business including, but not limited to, the further development of the business; the construction of a prototype, the development of a manufacturing process to produce, or to implement a marketing or distribution strategy for the product;

financial aid by the Agency is necessary for the commercial development of the business because funding for such commercial development of the business is only available on terms that would substantially hinder its successful commercial development; and
the employment created or maintained by commercial development and production of the business will be in the commonwealth.
